<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a></>}>
This class contains a discriminated union of information about pointers in memory operands, relating them back to LLVM IR or to virtual locations (such as frame indices) that are exposed during codegen. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand">MachineMemOperand</a></>}>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A description of a memory reference used in the backend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instead of holding a StoreInst or LoadInst, this class holds the address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Value of the reference along with a byte size and offset. This allows it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to describe lowered loads and stores. Also, the special PseudoSourceValue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// objects can be used to represent loads and stores to memory locations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that aren&#39;t explicit in the regular LLVM IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#a8f79d1bbb6720756b5115dd20f499bfb">MachineMemOperand</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Flags values. These may be or&#39;d together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dd">Flags</a> : uint16&#95;t &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No flags set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddac2989bebe46c9b9fcb7a92e5ade8dde6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddac2989bebe46c9b9fcb7a92e5ade8dde6">MONone</a> = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access reads data.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access writes data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddaed357b1367bc90a56fefa4d1b0e17374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddaed357b1367bc90a56fefa4d1b0e17374">MOStore</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access is volatile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda796891d6ca349b671fce24b6d01d77a8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda796891d6ca349b671fce24b6d01d77a8">MOVolatile</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access is non-temporal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda8d09c51969b0954512ed65ee26551081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda8d09c51969b0954512ed65ee26551081">MONonTemporal</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 3,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access is dereferenceable (i.e., doesn&#39;t trap).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda7b999a936bc7a4d45dfadbe356e77b3f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda7b999a936bc7a4d45dfadbe356e77b3f">MODereferenceable</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 4,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The memory access always returns the same value (or traps).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddac63dd9c4fe69bfeaac7a363fda846ac6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddac63dd9c4fe69bfeaac7a363fda846ac6">MOInvariant</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 5,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reserved for use by target-specific passes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Targets may override getSerializableMachineMemOperandTargetFlags() to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enable MIR serialization/parsing of these flags.  If more of these flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are added, the MIR printing/parsing code will need to be updated as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddace83cf304d65cdb6b3b22cc485eed877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddace83cf304d65cdb6b3b22cc485eed877">MOTargetFlag1</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 6,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda036efcf0f4eac932646d211f480528c3"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2dda036efcf0f4eac932646d211f480528c3">MOTargetFlag2</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 7,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddad7c78ebdd6e4c475178f5ca950914f33"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#aaa2020e47e35179234b9ea27d555b2ddad7c78ebdd6e4c475178f5ca950914f33">MOTargetFlag3</a> = 1u &lt;&lt; 8,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Atomic information for this memory operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">MachineAtomicInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Synchronization scope ID for this memory operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSID : 8;            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SyncScope::ID</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a MachineMemOperand object with the specified PtrInfo, flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// size, and base alignment. For atomic operations the synchronization scope</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and atomic ordering requirements must also be specified. For cmpxchg</span></CodeLine>
